net.gree.asdk.api
Class Leaderboard

java.lang.Object
  net.gree.asdk.api.Leaderboard

public class Leaderboard
extends java.lang.Object

Implements Gree Leaderboard API. This API includes leaderboards and high scores.

Author:
GREE, Inc.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Leaderboard.LeaderboardListener
          Delivery leaderboard results.

          Interface for receiving logging of object values.
static class Leaderboard.Score
          the Score object hold one score for one user.
static interface Leaderboard.ScoreListener
          Delivery of array of score results.
static interface Leaderboard.SuccessListener
          Delivery of pass/fail results, used when uploading or deleting a score for a leaderboard.

public static void loadLeaderboards(int startIndex,
                                    int count,
                                    Leaderboard.LeaderboardListener listener)
Retrieve leaderboard info for the current user.

Parameters:
startIndex - the index in the leaderboard list
count - the number of leaderboard to get
listener - the listener to notify the result

getScore

public static void getScore(java.lang.String lid,
                            int selector,
                            int period,
                            int startIndex,
                            int count,
                            Leaderboard.ScoreListener listener)
Retrieve scores from the server, for given leaderboard id.

Parameters:
lid - the id of the leaderboard
selector - should be one of Ranking.MY_SCORES, Ranking.FRIENDS_SCORES or Ranking.ALL_SCORES
period - should be one of Ranking.DAILY, Ranking.WEEKLY or Ranking.ALL_TIME
startIndex - the index in the score list
count - the number of scores to get
listener - Receives results.

getScore

public void getScore(int selector,
                     int period,
                     int startIndex,
                     int count,
                     Leaderboard.ScoreListener listener)
Retrieve scores from the server, for this leaderboard.

Parameters:
selector - should be one of Ranking.MY_SCORES, Ranking.FRIENDS_SCORES or Ranking.ALL_SCORES
period - should be one of Ranking.DAILY, Ranking.WEEKLY or Ranking.ALL_TIME
startIndex - the index in the score list
count - the number of scores to get
listener - Receives results.

createScore

public void createScore(long score,
                        Leaderboard.SuccessListener listener)
Upload a new score on this leaderboard. This will be retried automatically, if the score can not be delivered (e.g the server is not reachable),

Parameters:
score - value as a long
listener - Where results are delivered.

                               long score,
                               Leaderboard.SuccessListener listener)

Parameters:
lid - id of leaderboard
score - value as a long
listener - Where results are delivered.

getFormat

public int getFormat()
Determines how score values in this leaderboard are displayed.

Returns:
one of FORMAT_VALUE or FORMAT_TIME

getFormatSuffix

public java.lang.String getFormatSuffix()
This value can be set from the developer center on the leaderboard page. If the Score format is FORMAT_TIME, then this returns one of 'hour', 'minute', 'seconds'. If the score format is FORMAT_VALUE, then this returns the suffix to be appended to each score value.

Returns:
the score suffix format

getFormatDecimal

public int getFormatDecimal()
The number of decimal places to display.

Returns:
number of decimal

getSort

public int getSort()
Determines how score values are sorted.

Returns:
one of SORT_ORDER_ASCENDING or SORT_ORDER_DESCENDING

isSecret

public boolean isSecret()
Determines leaderboard visibility

Returns:
false if the leaderboard is visible, true otherwise

getThumbnail

public Bitmap getThumbnail()
Get the thumbnail for this leaderboard, synchronize call, return immediately.

Returns:
if the thumbnail is ready, return the bitmap,otherwise return null

loadThumbnail

public boolean loadThumbnail(IconDownloadListener listener)
Load the thumbnail of this leaderboard, asynchronize call,none-blocking, the listener will be called back when the request is done pass in the IconDownloadListener to get the result of the request.

Returns:
return false means the request could not fulfill(no listener,network error,permission error, etc).
